com.collective.celos.servlet

Class AbstractServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • HttpServlet
      • com.collective.celos.servlet.AbstractServlet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractJSONServlet, ClearCacheServlet, RerunServlet, SchedulerServlet

    public abstract class AbstractServlet
extends HttpServlet
    Superclass for all servlets that access the database. Serializes all database accesses with a lock.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static java.lang.Object LOCK
      This lock serves to synchronize all operations.
